xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/724454-Bold & Brash: Filmmaking Boisvert Style 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eUzdQ1gao1WA1b47K17d7AcRC7Q.jpg Y2K. With no experience nor training, Simon Boisvert embarks on a journey of writing and producing self-financed micro-budget narrative films. Nine years later, he had produced and distributed six feature films. This documentary, interspersed with various excerpts from his films and personal archive footage, recounts his journey through thick and thin, and as a laughing stock. Bold & Brash: Filmmaking Boisvert Style
